extension.name: HikaShop Dashboard
extension.author: Hikari Software / Obsidev
extension.description: HikaShop Dashboard for use in the Joomla! Control Panel page.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
